HIPPLUG-908
Use a cluster.options node as default for DynamicMultiSelect plugin configuration. If your project uses this field type, rename the now deprecated valuelist.options node. You can use the groovy script mentioned on this page.

HIPPLUG-926
Empty string option id value is now allowed and option text label can be configured in StaticDropDown field.
Also, to support static value list in SITE application, a new method was added in ValueListManager interface and its default implementation:
org.onehippo.forge.selection.hst.manager.ValueListManager#getStaticOptionsMap(String).
See this page for detail.

HIPPLUG-823
API change! Added interface method ValueListManager#getValueListIdentifiers() for the possibility to retrieve the identifiers of the configured value lists without casting. The implementation in DefaultValueListManager returns the keys of the map as configured in the Spring configuration, see the installation page
Also, expose the field documentFieldLocationMapping of the DefaultValueListManager like in release 2.06.07.

Upgrade to Hippo 7.9.
Incompatible with earlier versions due to upgrade to Wicket 6 so use 2.06.xx range for 7.8.

HIPPLUG-823
Expose the field documentFieldLocationMapping of the DefaultValueListManager. In a component, a cast to DefaultValueListManager is necessary.

HIPPLUG-793
To deselect all items in the DynamicMultiSelect list, use a localized label 'Deselect all' instead of 'x'.

HIPPLUG-442
In DynamicDropdown, make the addition of a first "Choose One" option configurable by property showDefault.

HIPPLUG-618
Support for interdependent (chained) DynamicDropdown fields, see observableId and observerId at Dynamic Dropdown configuration page.

HIPPLUG-697 and HIPPLUG-700
Fix not saving chosen value by DynamicDropdown.

HIPPLUG-628 (part two)
In DynamicMultiSelect, use exact same HTML markup as the CMS's PropertyFieldPlugin so there is some space between the label and the star.

HIPPLUG-618
Intermediate work for support for interdependent DynamicDropdown fields led to a bug in which the chosen value is not saved.

HIPPLUG-628
Add star (*) in DynamicMultiSelect when field is required.

HIPPLUG-645
Avoid exception when value list is not translated.

HIPPLUG-660
Preserve order of items in the returned map in SelectionUtil#valueListAsMap()

HIPPLUG-601
Better handling of an absent configuration node in DynamicMultiSelectPlugin.

HIPPLUG-624
Retrieving translated value lists in the CMS depended on deprecated virtual translation nodes.

HIPPLUG-574
More careful logging and coding in DocumentValueListProvider.

HIPPLUG-580
Support relative paths to value list documents in DefaultValueListManager on 7.8.
Note: when using relative paths in the site's identifier/path mapping, be sure to supply the site content base bean as argument in the ValueListManager methods!

HIPPLUG-531
CMS doesn't store/show field's valuelist provider.
The property valuelist.provider in /hippo:namespaces was renamed to valuelistProvider so in the document type editor, setting the value works.
Note: if you have such property valuelist.provider in a document type's editor configuration, please rename the property in code base (XML) and in your environments (manually or by making the type reload during deployment).

HIPPLUG-548
Set sequence numbers higher than 20000.

HIPPLUG-544
Bump to CMS 7.8 dependency versions. Note: this release is also compatible with 7.7.

HIPPLUG-529
DynamicDropdown is not loaded into new repositories.

HIPPLUG-497
Add hippo:availability to value list prototype avoiding new documents not being visible in HST. Important when using repository 2.22.08 and higher.
Note: selection namespace nodes are reloaded in existing environments.

HIPPLUG-412
In HST, get translated bean by language only if not found by full locale.

HIPPLUG-334
German translations in CMS.
Hide namespace from CMS folder view.

Improvement in support for translated value lists in compounds:
determine the locale for compounds (that should not be hippotranslation:translated) by using locale from parent(s).

Support for translated value lists:
- made a value list have hippotranslation:translated mixin on creation
- in CMS, added IValueListProvider method getValueList with a java.util.Locale
- in HST, added ValueListManager methods getValueList and getValueListItem with a java.util.Locale
Support for finding value lists in HST outside site content root using an absolute path starting with slash.

HIPPLUG-225
Make sort helper objects serializable
Throw exception when the DynamicDropdown is used on a multiple field
Avoid warning log if configuration to valuelist is correct.
Compatibility with CMS 7.6 (2.20) and HST 2.22.
Sorting capabilities for plugins backed by a value list object (DynamicDropdownPlugin, DynamicMultiSelectPlugin and RadioGroupPlugin).
Compatibility with CMS 7.6 (2.19) and HST 2.20.
Compatibility with CMS 7.5 (2.18) and HST 2.20.
Backported sorting capabilities, see 2.04.01.
[#70] Behavior change between 2.01.xx and 2.02.xx
HIPPLUG-127: in multiselect plugin, show value labels in compare mode.
HIPPLUG-124: remove UpgraderModule configuration from root pom.
HIPPLUG-96: different labels for RadioGroup and BooleanRadioGroup.
Ready for the ECM 2.16.xx series.
Support for optgroup elements in a dropdown element.
Added upgrade module for the configuration.
Documentation improvements.
Added a HST ValueListManager component to get HST valuelist content beans from, enabling presentation of the labels corresponding to the key values in a document.
Restructure of project, leading to three artifacts under group id org.onehippo.forge.selectionplugins: selectionplugins-addon-repository, selectionplugins-addon-cms and selectionplugins-hstclient.
Renamed package org.onehippo.forge.cms to org.onehippo.forge.selection. Note that this applies also to the configuration of fields in the CMS.
Upgrade to ECM 2.10.00 including Wicket 1.4 API.
Style fixes for IE for RadioGroupPlugin.
Fix the DocumentValueListProvider for the namespace change.
Changed formerly correct document namespace 'dropdown' to 'selection'.
In MultiSelectPlugin, added the possiblitity to configure style 'palette' showing a palette a.k.a. shootbox, i.e. two lists with selection arrows between them.
First release based on move from forge project 'dropdown-plugin'.
Adding radio group plugin.
The key label pairs are now horizontally positioned on the page to save space.
The items in the value list can now be now ordered, so you can change the position of the key value pairs in the list.
Added possiblitity to configure style 'checkboxes' besides 'selectlist'.
Introduction of DynamicMultiSelect.
Usage of ValueListProvider services by DynamicMultiSelect and DynamicDropdown to create the possibility for project specific list creation.
DynamicDropdown.
StaticDropdown.
